subject: Re: [junit] Re: Help plz...
msgSnippet: ... Yes. But to see the effect of longer names you have to test a typical mix of operations, including *	loading software from disk *	run-time interpretation -
messageBody:
On Thu, 25 Sep 2003, Ray Tayek wrote:

> > > a simple test seems to indicate no difference using 1.4.1_01-b-1, mixed
> > > mode...
> >
> >In this form the test doesn't measure what we are talking about: the
> >long names are local variables that become integer stack offsets in
> >the bytecode. These names do not go in the constant pool. ...
>
> i see. so would: static final int iWithAVeryLongName; end up in the
> constant pool?

Yes.

But to see the effect of longer names you have to test a typical mix
of operations, including

* loading software from disk
* run-time interpretation - operations like instanceof
* communications that embed names, such as RPCs
